summary: Added verum/falsum notation macros to logos-notation.sty and updated .claude/context/ documentation to establish consistent four-element terminology for bilateral semantics.

Added bilateral top/bottom documentation and clarified terminology
Renamed section headers to Top Constant/Bottom Constant, removed NOTE tag

completion_data.completion_summary: Added \Top, \Bot, \ver, \fal macros to logos-notation.sty and updated LaTeX/Typst notation-conventions.md to document bilateral semantics four-element verum/falsum system.
